attributes.action: Create a new, permanent, Memorial Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details:
With one of the highest coronavirus death rates in the world, a new Bank Holiday would be a fitting reminder in perpetuity, for the significant multitude of loss (of life, physical and mental health, employment, businesses, relationships, and multiple sources of support). 

We are a nation in mourning, and too often grief and loss have been privatised within our culture. This new Bank Holiday would be an opportunity for the Government to show its ongoing commitment to wellbeing.
attributes.background: Create a new, permanent, Memorial Bank Holiday, to remember the many lives lost, give voice to the grieving, and acknowledge the collective loss and sacrifice of the people of the UK, due to Coronavirus.

rejection.details:

Introduce a new UK bank holiday to mark the day we went into lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556562

Bank Holiday to recognise unity during Covid Pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561277

Government to declare a new annual bank holiday to celebrate essential workers
